item.title: Learning words & concepts
item.description: Our exploration of the dynamics between language and semantic, labels and concepts, includes the study of how the association between words and their meaning is built, as well as how developmet (and issues during development) affects that association. Learning novel concepts Vigano, S., Borghesani, V., & Piazza, M. (2021) Symbolic categorization of novel multisensory stimuli in the human brain. NeuroImage, p.118016. We used fMRI to study how the brain categorizes multisensory objects using words.
